snippet.title: ✅  Amber Heard ‘left with pus-filled wounds when Johnny Depp pulled out her hair’
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMWjJ3knbjImE8pdNeB2Rfw?sub_confirmation=1
✍   Amber Heard has claimed she was left with pus-filled wounds when Johnny Depp allegedly pulled out clumps of her hair.  The 34-year-old actress is on her third day of giving evidence in her ex-husband’s libel trial against The Sun’s publisher News Group Newspapers (NGN), and alleges that Depp, 57, was physically and emotionally abusive towards her.  During Wednesday morning’s session, Depp’s lawyer Eleanor Laws QC questioned Heard about an alleged incident of domestic violence in Los Angeles in December 2015, which the Aquaman actress described in her first witness statement as ‘one of the worst and most violent nights of our relationship’.    Ms Heard alleges that Johnny Depp slapped her, dragged her by the hair through their apartment – pulling clumps of her hair out – and then repeatedly punched her in the head.    The actress became visibly upset as Ms Laws read through passages of her witness statement detailing the alleged abuse.  Ms Laws said: ‘That’s just a complete set of lie ...
💖
